post_title: LTB: T206 Lajoie & Marquard - SC150 / Fac 649
post_content:
Looking to buy T206 Lajoie (Throwing) and/or Marquard (Hands) with a Sweet Cap 150 / Factory 649 back (over print or no over print is fine). Looking for lower condition 1 or 2 most likely.

If you send me a PM that says your Dad has an example of this for sale, I hope you die a slow, painful death.
